MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL15 postcode area of Ruthin. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of on site difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:00PM on 26th December 2020
